notes: Upscale, modern apartment with luxury finishes including marble-look tile floors, recessed LED ceiling lights, central AC, glass-topped coffee table with sharp corners, and dark-toned designer furniture. The living area is spacious at 59 ping with polished surfaces throughout. Baby safety concerns include the sharp-edged glass coffee table, hard tile flooring, and the bedroom appears to lack natural light with no visible windows; the living room has curtained windows suggesting reasonable daylight. Listed through HOYUAN Real Estate Agency, suggesting it targets expat/foreign tenants.
